item.description:
UPCOMING CLASSES

April 20th - 7:30pm Eastern Time

May 11th - 7:30pm Eastern Time

REGISTER HERE: http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/date-smarter-teleclass-for-men-women/

 

  • Be sure to register with your valid email and cell phone number. The day of the class you will receive the call in number and PIN code to access this teleclass. You will receive this notification via email AND text.
  • Only 10 spots available for this teleclass.
  • Must call in to the teleclass no later than 10 minutes before the advertised start time.
  • Class will last 75-90 minutes

These are my favorite types of events!! Singles getting together to discuss and get feedback from other singles and the opposite sex. Hear insight from other Manhattan daters, get some tips on how to work through certain challenges and, best of all, meet new people. There's an outline of topics I like to discuss.(See below.) But everyone gets to share what their particular confusion or question is and we then discuss it in an open forum

You live in a major metropolitan city. You'd thinking finding someone special would be a breeze, right?

Well..it can be. You can meet the love of your life at the corner bodega, at the gym, on Facebook or Match.com or on the L train. You just need to know how to optimize your opportunities, learn how to spot and avoid the time wasters and make the right impression.

Join other singles - male and female - to learn how to navigate the current dating landscape. You'll be in a room full of people who share similar questions, concerns and issues. Get feedback from the opposite sex and get inside their mind.

There will be a seminar AND open forum portion so you can discuss specific issues.


POPULAR/FREQUENT TOPICS OF DISCUSSION
~Dating & Social Media
*How has social media (texting, Twitter. Facebook, Online Dating) changed dating? Has it made it easier or more difficult?
*Online dating - Learn how to decode and decipher someone's profile, feel someone out and set up the date.

~Online Dating
How to spot and deal with the time wasters, what behaviors are common, tips about your profile and photos

~What Are The Best Ways/Places to Meet People?
Bars? Classes? Social Groups? Online? Which has a better return on investment and why?

~How to Tell What Are They Looking For
Discuss how to manage expectations and learn how to determine what sort of relationship they're looking for.

~The Fade
Why did they just disappear without warning? Is there really such a thing as closure?

"Not sure you get to read these. Well, if you do, Thanks for giving me the confidence to get back out there. After being married for many years, it was strange to get out and attempt to meet someone. I attended your dating group Q&A about reading signs etc and right after the meeting had dinner with someone from the group. After that I had the confidence to follow through with some other women. It has resulted in being with my girlfriend for over 3 years now. We have a great relationship. Thanks for helping me bring out the best in me. - C from NY"

Mariann
“ i really enjoyed this workshop as it was definitely insightful. i was ready for the constructive criticism to get my dating profile up to par. chris had great advice and a gave us all a handbook on how to perfect our profile. looking forward to improving mine and getting more hits from quality men! ”

Shannon
“ I found the meetup very informative. I liked the hand-out, and I enjoyed getting to know new people. ”

“ This was a very worthwhile event, it was very interactive, everyone felt at ease and the discussion was very animated. I think the best part was the ability to have the current profile critiqued. I even learned from the critique of other people's profiles, not just my own. Well done! ” - Jyothi

"Hey Chris-Just wanted to let you know that maybe it's a coincidence but
I feel like I'm already getting more responses to my profile
since I changed some things you told me to change :) Thanks for all your advice! - DeDe"
item.name: Date Smarter Teleclass for Men & Women
